'''Die Heilige Sinfonie''' is a [[Special Dish|special]] [[food]] item that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Cold Cut Platter]] with [[Fischl]]. The recipe for Cold Cut Platter is obtainable by completing the domain [[Eagle's Gate]] after reaching [[Adventure Rank]] 21.

Die Heilige Sinfonie increases the party's {{Color|Physical DMG}} by '''55'''% for 300 seconds. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].

==Trivia==
*"Die Heilige Sinfonie" is German for "the holy symphony."
*To celebrate Fischl's birthday, the [[Teyvat Food Notes]] released a [https://ys.mihoyo.com/main/news/detail/15689 real-life recipe] for Die Heilige Sinfonie.
*The following birthday mails included Die Heilige Sinfonie:
**[[Mail/Day of Destiny... (2021-05-27)|Fischl's 2021 Birthday Mail]] (1 Die Heilige Sinfonie)
**[[Mail/Day of Destiny... (2022-05-27)|Fischl's 2022 Birthday Mail]] (1 Die Heilige Sinfonie)
* Fischl's mother's "cold cut platter" is said to be her "specialty."<ref>{{Ref/Quest|The_Ancient_Azure_Stars_(Part_3)}}</ref>
